description: This small piece of thin copper has a seemingly abstract pattern cut from the center of it. The pattern changes when you look away. You can use this in conjunction with a tailor's kit to apply a runic clothing enhancement, but multiples may be necessary depending on the item.

This small piece of thin silver has a seemingly abstract pattern cut from the center of it. The pattern changes when you look away. You can use this in conjunction with a tailor's kit to apply a runic clothing enhancement, but multiples may be necessary depending on the item.

This small piece of thin gold has a seemingly abstract pattern cut from the center of it. The pattern changes when you look away. You can use this in conjunction with a tailor's kit to apply a runic clothing enhancement, but multiples may be necessary depending on the item.
